sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; import {minutesToDuration} from '../utils/duration'; import {secondsToDuration} from '../utils/duration'; function Pomodoro({isTimerRunning, setIsTimerRunning, setFocusTime, defaultFocusTime, defaultBreakTime, setBreakTime, setSessionTime, setSessionType, focusTime, breakTime, sessionTime, sessionType}) { return (
Focus Duration: { minutesToDuration(focusTime) }
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakTime)}
); } export default Pomodoro;
